content: to the pattern i hope you enjoy ********* **3/27/23** **please note ** it has come to my attention that the video links in this pattern are broken sorry but there s nothing i can do about that a detailed description and photos of each of these stitches is included in the pattern and i m hoping they will be a clear enough explanation of lyuda s special techniques 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/lyudmila-hefny 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/hats-for-sailors 3 https //www knitcompanion com 4 https //www doctorswithoutborders org 5 https //wck org 6 https //www ravelry com/people/kathic 7 https //www ravelry com/people/ophelia
